snippet: The governor earned $230,000 last year from his state salary and investment income, had federal taxes totaling $36,919, meaning his effective federal tax rate was just under 20 percent.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo’s tax returns show that he earned about $230,000 in 2012 from his state salary and investment income; his overall income was about the same as in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The governor earned $230,000 last year from his state salary and investment income, had federal taxes totaling $36,919, meaning his effective federal tax rate was just under 20 percent.

headline.main: Cuomo’s ’12 Tax Forms Show Income Similar to ’11
headline.print_headline: Cuomo’s ’12 Tax Forms Show Income Similar to ’11
